name: Air Combat
description: Board the XF-97 prototype and enjoy a large air battle with a lot of ally and enemy fighters!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit) Processor: Intel Dual-Core 2GHz or AMD Dual-Core 2GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1700 MB available space Sound Card:
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7,8,10(64bit) Processor: Intel Quad-Core or AMD Octo-Core Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1050ti,AMD Radeon RX560 or higher DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 1700 MB available space Sound Card:
